format:
<style>
    ui-card-panel {
        border-radius: 10px;
        box-shadow: rgba(100, 100, 111, 0.2) 0px 7px 29px 0px;
    }

    md-card .value {
        font-size: 26px;
        border-radius: 10px;
        text-align: center;
    }

    .nr-dashboard-cardpanel layout-column {
        border: 1px solid #fff;
    }

    md-card .label {
        font-size: 20px;
    }

    .nr-dashboard-cardtitle {
        text-align: center;
        font-size: 30px;

    }

    .nr-dashboard-widget-N_MERO_DE_S_RIE.visible {
        top: 0 !important;
    }

    .nr-dashboard-widget-STATUS.visible .value {
        border-radius: 7px;
        font-size: 20px;
    }

    md-card.nr-dashboard-text._md.layout-column.layout-align-center-center.nr-dashboard-widget-AVAN_OS.visible {
        top: 350px !important;
    }

    md-card.nr-dashboard-text._md.layout-column.layout-align-center-center.nr-dashboard-widget-STATUS.visible {
        top: 430px !important;
        border-radius: 10px;
    }

    #BRF_CONTADOR_cards>md-card:nth-child(1) {
        top: 2% !important
    }

    #BRF_CONTADOR {
        top: 50% !important;
        left: 10% !important;
    }

    #BRF_CONTADOR_cards>md-card:nth-child(4) {
        top: 80%;
    }

    #BRF_CONTADOR_cards>md-card:nth-child(3) {
        top: 25% !important;
    }

    #BRF_CONTAGEM_cards>md-card>p.label {
        font-size: 26px;
        font-weight: bold;
        text-align: center;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
    }

    #BRF_CONTAGEM_cards>md-card>p.value {
        font-size: 66px;
        text-align: center;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
    }

    #BRF_CONTAGEM_cards {
        width: 512px !important;
        height: 170px !important;
    }

    #BRF_CONTAGEM_cards>md-card {
        left: 13% !important;
        top: 50px !important;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
    }

    #BRF_CONTAGEM_cards>md-card.nr-dashboard-text._md.layout-column.layout-align-center-center.nr-dashboard-widget-Frangos.visible {
        top: 120px !important;
    }

    #BRF_PERFORMANCE_cards>md-card:nth-child(1) {
        top: 20px !important;
    }

    #BRF_PERFORMANCE_cards>md-card:nth-child(3) {
        left: 35px !important;
        top: 390px !important;
        height: 49px !important;
    }

    #Tab_BRF {
        top: 30% !important;
    }

    #BRF_DISPONIBILIDADE>div>p {
        width: 501px !important;
        font-size: 24px !important;
        font-weight: bold !important;
    }

    #BRF_PERFORMANCE_cards {
        height: 500px !important;
    }

    #BRF_DISPONIBILIDADE>div {
        width: 512px !important;
        height: 318px !important;
    }

    #BRF_DISPONIBILIDADE_cards {
        left: 50px;
    }

    #BRF_DISPONIBILIDADE {
        top: 190px !important;
        left: 40% !important;
    }

    #BRF_DISPONIBILIDADE>div>p {
        color: #fff;
    }

    #BRF_CONTAGEM {
        left: 40% !important;
    }
</style>
